content: i m thrilled that so many people like this pattern and i m finally finally adding it as a proper pattern after many gentle nudges to do so i hope you enjoy making your blanket i riffed on the mason-dixon how to log cabin pattern for this blanket in my example i made 19 squares from 19 skeins of noro and the leftover ends made up the 20th square the two skeins of cascade eco wool made the sashing and the border if you choose to make your blanket larger or smaller you will need more or fewer skeins of yarn both kureyon and ecowool please feel free to contact me with questions and have fun ** similar crochet version in french 1 ** this is a different pattern listing 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/plaid-log-cabin-au-crochet 2 http //p5 storage canalblog com/58/66/388609/58408891 pdf
